pages.text: By locking Feywild behind the Mythic Botany progression, Pixies and Biomes will only spawn in the Alfheim Dimension. Lock Feywild behind Alfheim progress by selecting 'alfheim_locked' in the config file.

pages.title: Tree Patches
pages.text: Some magic of the Feywild still leaks into the Overworld, and random Tree patches of Feywild trees will still spawn.

pages.title: Ancient Runestone
pages.text: The Blacksmith and Library still spawn in the Overworld when using Alfheim Locked. However, you can still summon the Blacksmith by using a Rune of Nidavellir on a Anicent Runestone.
Check out the video for more information:
